doodlejump.peli

Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • doodlejump.peli.Platform
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlatformDissapearing, PlatformMoving

    public class Platform
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a platform in the game.
